IntensityReader Class Reference

Abstract base class for a class that read files and fills in memory representation and chip stream objects that need initialization. More...

#include <IntensityReader.h>

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for a class that read files and fills in memory representation and chip stream objects that need initialization.
